body:
@davecheney for the record, I'm not debating the v<SemVer> part. I just want folks to adequately understand the space they're making a decision in. Especially those who aren't familiar with it but may want to have an opinion.

It may be worth looking at two issues discussing prefixes of SemVer in [1](https://github.com/mojombo/semver/issues/1) and [204](https://github.com/mojombo/semver/issues/204). That's right, the very first issue filed against SemVer had to do with the 'v'. This is something new I learned today.
